user.title: Add E-commerce Provider
user.description: E-commerce platform (Provider) refers to Amazon Inc., Coupang Inc., etc. Some e-commerce platforms require you to add a “device”. You may need to take additional steps like these if you need to log in or if there are regional requirements.

setup.title: Setup E-commerce Provider
setup.description: Please follow the instructions below to set up the e-commerce provider.

gs_login.title: Add GS THE FRESH Provider
gs_login.description: Open https://nid.naver.com/oauth2.0/authorize?response_type=code&client_id=VFjv3tsLofatP90P1a5H&locale=en&oauth_os=ios&redirect_uri=woodongs and copy the 'Code' query string from the redirected page.
